comment.value: Mechaduino based board with better drivers and some additional improvements
Minimal Schematic to create an Arduino Zero compatible board

title_block.title: Step Down with input range of 10V-50V
ProStep25-32 input including optional galvanic separation

libpart.description: 64Kb (8192x8) Serial EEPROM with Unique Serial Number, TSSOP8
4.0 to 30V Input, 1A output, integrated switch step-down regulator, SOT-23-6 package
resettable fuse, polymeric positive temperature coefficient (PPTC)
